metadata.title: BLACKHAWK Men's Performance Cotton Pant
features: Reinforced hems on leg cuffs for increased durability
Silicone grip strip in waistband keeps shirt tucked in during extreme maneuvers and a hidden, expandable waistband that slides to increase waist size for increased mobility
Do Not Dry Clean, Machine Warn Temp 30C, Non-Chlorine Bleach When Needed, Tumble Dry Normal Medium Heat, Iron Low Heat, No Steam
description: Blackhawk Men's Performance Cotton Pant

These rugged tactical pants are designed with high-performance materials and come equipped with a number of innovative features, giving you everything you need for optimum performance—utility, comfort, and durability.
Key Features
Constructed of durable, wrinkle, and fade-resistant 8.5 oz. cotton canvas
Constructed of durable, wrinkle, and fade-resistant 8.5 oz. cotton canvas
Double layering in seat and knees for added wear and protection
Double layering in seat and knees for added wear and protection
Gusseted crotch allows increased movement
Gusseted crotch allows increased movement
Extra-wide, reinforced belt loops accommodate BLACKHAWK! CQB/Rigger’s Belt and other belts up to 1.75” wide
Extra-wide, reinforced belt loops accommodate BLACKHAWK! CQB/Rigger’s Belt and other belts up to 1.75” wide
Silicone grip strip in waistband keeps shirt tucked in during extreme maneuvers
Silicone grip strip in waistband keeps shirt tucked in during extreme maneuvers
Hidden, expandable waistband slides to increase waist size for increased mobility
Hidden, expandable waistband slides to increase waist size for increased mobility
Angle-cut hand pockets have flat edges for proper placement and orientation of knives, pens, etc.
Angle-cut hand pockets have flat edges for proper placement and orientation of knives, pens, etc.
Each leg has an easy-access, top-opening mag pouch
Each leg has an easy-access, top-opening mag pouch
Large, top-opening cargo pockets with elastic webbing inside to secure and properly orient up to three automatic weapon mags
Large, top-opening cargo pockets with elastic webbing inside to secure and properly orient up to three automatic weapon mags
Zippered access on cargo pocket
Zippered access on cargo pocket
Zippered, rear hip pocket keeps wallet secure, out of the way, and separate from large rear pockets
Zippered, rear hip pocket keeps wallet secure, out of the way, and separate from large rear pockets
Large, hidden zipper pocket behind righthand pocket
Large, hidden zipper pocket behind righthand pocket
Reinforced hems on leg cuffs for increased durability
Reinforced hems on leg cuffs for increased durability
Integrated knee pad pockets (pads sold separately)
Integrated knee pad pockets (pads sold separately)
High-quality YKK zippers and Prym snaps
High-quality YKK zippers and Prym snaps
